alert.note: Alert for Allegan; Barry; Kalamazoo (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 24 at 3:13PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Allegan, Barry and northern Kalamazoo Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 313 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Westwood, or near Kalamazoo, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kalamazoo... Portage... Hastings... Otsego... Plainwell... Middleville... Galesburg... Richland... Freeport... Martin... Westwood... Comstock Northwest... Gull Lake... Alamo... Orangeville... Irving... Augusta... Woodland... Delton... Yankee Springs... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
